EDUCATION

Doctoral Degree Programme in Computer Science and Engineering,2021 
University of Oulu, Finland.

  • Research Advisor: Dr Denzil Ferreira

Master of Science (Technology) Computer Science and Engineering, June 2018 University of Oulu, Finland

  • 126 ECTS credits completed 
  • Master’s thesis graded excellent 
  • Master’s thesis supervised by Dr Denzil Ferreira and Dr Simo Hosio
  • Average degree grade of 4.41 (very good)

items.content_html:
Please find below a list of all publications. Alternatively you can vist my Google scholar page

2018

  • S3: environmental fingerprinting with a credit card-sized NFC powered sensor board. Tore  Leikanger, Christian  Schuss, Simon  Klakegg, Aku  Visuri and Denzil  Ferreira.  2018. In Proceedings of the 20th International Conference on Human-Computer Interaction with Mobile Devices and Services Adjunct, Barcelona, Spain, ACM, 298-305. [PDF] [DOI]  
  • STOP: A Smartphone-based Game for Parkinson’s Disease Medication Adherence. Valerii Kan, Dorina Rajanen, Kennedy Opoku Asare, Denzil Ferreira (2018, October).  In Ubicomp’18 (To appear) ACM. [PDF][DOI] 
  • CampusTracker – Assessing the Momentary Willingness to Work on a Paid Mobile Crowdsourcing Task. Jonas Oppenlaender, Simo Hosio, Kennedy Opoku Asare. (2018, October).  In Ubicomp'18 (To appear) ACM. 
  • Ludic Markers for Player-Player Observation in Location-Based Mobile Games. Alavesa, Paula, Minna Pakanen, Timo Ojala, Kennedy Opoku Asare, Karri Ojala, Mikko Lehto, and Hannu Kukka. Simulation & Gaming (2018). [DOI]  

2016

  • Here n' there: location based mobile game exploring the possibilities of location spoofing in game mechanics. Paula Alavesa, Mikko Lehto, Karri Ojala and Kennedy Opoku Asare.  2016.  In Proceedings of the 15th International Conference on Mobile and Ubiquitous Multimedia, Rovaniemi, Finland, ACM, 331-333. [PDF] [DOI]
